snippet: Efforts to increase and improve regulation of Wall Street have bogged down, and the Systemic Risk Council, formed by the Pew Charitable Trusts, intends to fight for better rules.
abstract: Systemic Risk Council will monitor and encourage regulatory reform in light of slowed efforts to increase and improve regulation of Wall Street; Dodd-Frank passed in 2010 provided for numerous regulatory improvements, but little progress has been made.
lead_paragraph: Efforts to increase and improve regulation of Wall Street have bogged down, and the Systemic Risk Council, formed by the Pew Charitable Trusts, intends to fight for better rules.

headline.seo: New Systemic Risk Council to Press for Stricter Financial Regulations
headline.main: Group Forms to Urge Strict Oversight of Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Group Forms To Urge Strict Oversight Of Wall St.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
